Cat Quest

Charming top-down action RPG about a heroic cat saving Felingard.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Main quest & side quests; short-session friendly.
  • Controller required: Yes
  • Local co-op: No
  • Best with a controller.
  • Snappy combat and simple skill system.

Where to buy / play at home

  • Green Man Gaming
  • Fanatical
  • GOG
  • Humble Store
  • Amazon (Switch / eShop code)
  • Steam
  • Epic Games (creator code)
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes Best with a controller., Snappy combat and simple skill system.
PC Yes Full content; high framerates
Xbox Yes Console edition
PlayStation Yes Console edition
Switch Yes Portable play
Mobile Yes Premium mobile release

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.

Features

  • Local co-op: No
  • Online co-op (native): No
  • Controller recommended: Yes

Recommended hardware

  • xbox controller
  • ps5 dualsense

Notes

  • If you like it, *Cat Quest II* adds co-op (home platforms).
